department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 學習不同資料探勘的方法與如何在生物的資料模型使用
goal.en: Learn about how the data mining methods and how to apply on biology data.

outline.ch:
Introduction
Background of Probability
Data cleanining (1)
Data cleanining (2)
Association Rules and its bio-apps(1)
Association Rules and its bio-apps(2)
Model evaluation
Decision Tree
naive Bayesian classifier
Bayesian Network
Lazy Learner and Knn
Neural Networks (NN) and its bio-apps
Support Vector Machines (SVM) and its bio-apps
Genetic Algorithm (GA) and its bio-apps
Discussion and case study on classification(1)
Discussion and case study on classification(2)
Hidden Markov Models (HMM) and its bio-apps
Expectation Maximization (EM) and its bio-apps
(final exam)
outline.en:
Introduction
Background of Probability
Data cleanining (1)
Data cleanining (2)
Association Rules and its bio-apps(1)
Association Rules and its bio-apps(2)
Model evaluation
Decision Tree
naive Bayesian classifier
Bayesian Network
Lazy Learner and Knn
Neural Networks (NN) and its bio-apps
Support Vector Machines (SVM) and its bio-apps
Genetic Algorithm (GA) and its bio-apps
Discussion and case study on classification(1)
Discussion and case study on classification(2)
Hidden Markov Models (HMM) and its bio-apps
Expectation Maximization (EM) and its bio-apps
(final exam)

textbook.en: Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques  by Jiawei Han

flexDiscription.ch: 總週數以及彈性方法於前幾周上課投票討論。
flexDiscription.en: total weeks will be discussed on class
